question: What is the theme of 2019 edition of World Pneumonia Day (WPD)?
option2: Every Breath Counts: Stop Pneumonia Now
option4: Universal access to pneumonia prevention and care
explanation: The World Pneumonia Day (WPD)?is observed every year on 12th of November to raise awareness about pneumonia, the world’s leading infectious killer of children under the age of 5. The 2019 theme is “Healthy Lungs for all” to raise awareness, promote prevention and treatment and produce action to combat the disease.
